Something off-topic: I stopped uploading scene releases for full games or apps. I only upload DOX stuff for games (mainly updates).

@chourdis, from what I see from the nfo, this release combines the 3 scene releases (RELOADED, GENESIS, ITWINS), so you can download it and try.

By the way, I think that the name of the release is actually: 
Pro_Evolution_Soccer_2011_MULTI_DVD_PC-R55

In the end maybe I will also download this. Thanks Morck22 :)
@chourdis, from the included screenshots (r55-pes2011-proofa.jpg, r55-pes2011-proofb.jpg), it seems it supports both Greek text and audio. In fact for all 7 languages it has text and audio.
